name: Daeodon
description: The Daeodon is a large, powerful beast with a muscular build and formidable presence, boasting strong melee capabilities and notable resilience.
memorable: Its ability to intimidate foes with a fierce call and withstand damage makes it unique and fearsome in combat.
goals: To dominate combat scenarios through intimidation and overwhelming physical attacks.
relations: May be found in the company of other fierce beasts or as a solitary predator.
environment: Typically found in wild, open areas where it can charge at prey.
strengths: High Strength allows for significant damage output and the Relentless ability enhances its survivability.
weaknesses: Poor Dexterity limits its ability to avoid attacks, and low Intelligence restricts strategic options.
attacks: Features powerful melee attacks with Bite and Slam, capable of grappling and restraining opponents.
most_powerful_ability: Fierce Call instills fear in nearby foes, forcing them to drop their weapons and flee.
senses: Possesses Keen Smell, granting advantage on perception checks related to smell.
skills: Has a passive perception of 11, which is indicative of its moderate awareness.
additional_information: Strong melee capabilities and significant damage output.
Can knock opponents prone for tactical advantages.
Relentless ability allows it to survive otherwise lethal blows.
Low Intelligence and Charisma mean limited strategic play.
A fearsome presence on the battlefield.
test_queries: formidable beast that charges at foes
monster with keen smell and powerful melee attacks
